revised_title: The Term Structure of Thallium's Spark Spectrum, Tl III
tldr: The authors investigated the term structure of the second spark spectrum of thallium (Tl III) and identified the real F and G first members, as well as members of each of the S, P, and D series. They also examined the Hg II spectrum and made progress in understanding its structure. The study provides insights into the atomic structure and ionization of thallium.
